title: Riaru de Reberu Age Shitara Hobo Chītona Jinsei ni Natta - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Assassins   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Cheats   Clingy Lover   Clumsy Love Interests   Cold Love Interests   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Easy Going Life   Enemies Become Lovers   Fairies   First-time Interc**rse   Game Elements   Grinding   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Human Experimentation   Kuudere   Level System   Living Alone   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Popular Love Interests   R-15   Secretive Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Threesome   Tsundere   Underestimated Protagonist   Younger Love Interests
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description:
If a man ‘Levels Up’, any boring work can be repeated endlessly―Natsuno Taiyou.

“Talent” should be useful only in game, but even in reality how is it useful!?

When Taiyou woke up he received a power from a fairy “The ability to Level Up in the real world”, but immediately when leveling up boring work, surprisingly ‘popularity’ had dropped down!―However, the charm level that was originally 0, has thank god become ‘65535′!

Taiyou aims to level 100. And enjoy a harem life with seven brides.>
